steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters valid credentials
clicks the login button
the user should be redirected to the homepage
should see a welcome message

elements.name: Unsuccessful User Login with Invalid Credentials

the user enters an invalid username or password
clicks the login button
an error message should be displayed
